items.sentence: I'm going to come home a little early. There isn't much work at the office anyway.
I liked the concert we went to last week better than the one we went to yesterday.
The reason that the report had so many mistakes was because I wrote it in a hurry.
After years of living on his own, Tom found it hard to adjust to living with Mary.
Tom was furious, but he tempered his language because there were children present.
